lines: 1. Mitima iseke-lele, Te kula-i-Iishanya, Ilyo Lesa atulenga Ukuba bantu bakwe.
Tuleseke-Iela Iyonse. Ulubu-to lwaisa, Tulesekelela mu milimo, Lyonse, Twakulasekelela
2. Atusunga mu ma-boko, Bubi ta-bwa-ka cimfye, Alitulaya ku-twafwa, E bulayo bwa cine.
3. Ilyo twafilwa ku-bomba, Tulomfwa u-bukali, Icinshingwa catu-fimba, Twafilwa kwimba lwimbo.
4. Basuma bali ne nsansa, Mu nshita ya-lungama, Tumfwe fya cine tu-konke, Tuleke bubi bwesu.
